ModMetaData.name: AlienFacesExpanded
ModMetaData.author: Diamonddragon41
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Killface 1.0 Update by InsertKey (thank you!) Big Thanks to Hauvega for the new Patching system!!!
One of the things I found lacking in Alien Faces was that only one hand type was available- human. The main bulk of this mod is adding alien hands and feet to bipedal aliens. I aim to do much more with the mod as it progresses, but I had enough work done I thought some people might like it.
Digitigrade paws + claw hand ----------------Xenn, Orassans, Racc, Ferian, Ferrex, Logann, Gnolls, and Beast Men Tribe RaccoonMan, FoxMan, LynxMan, BearMan and WolfMan Raptor feet + feather wing arm----------------Avian Races, Avail Horse hoof + hoof hand-------------------------Equium Elephant toes + thick hand---------------------Beast Men Tribes ElephantMan Camel hoof + hoof hand------------------------Beast Men Tribes CamelMan Goat hoof + hoof hand--------------------------Beast Men Tribes GazelleMan, PigMan, ElkMan Human feet + human hand--------------------Ni'Hal, Zabrak, Twi'lek, Chjees Androids, FTL Rockman, FTL Zoltan, FantasyGoblin Human feet+hand, Facial Stuff Faces------Callistan Mantis legs+mantis claw-----------------------FTL Mantis No feet + human hand--------------------------FTL Slug Robot feet + robot hand------------------------FTL Engie
